name: SetValueFromXML
friendlyName: Set variable with value from XML
description: Extracts a value from a xML source (file or content) using XPath and sets it's value to a variable.
author: Yod Labs

inputs.name: variableName
inputs.label: Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable you wish to set the value to. Either a new or an existing one.

inputs.name: xPathExpression
inputs.label: XPath expression
inputs.helpMarkDown: XPath expression to get the value.

inputs.name: namespaces
inputs.label: Namespaces
inputs.helpMarkDown: The list of namespaces. One per line with the format prefix=namespace

inputs.name: XML
inputs.label: XML content
inputs.helpMarkDown: The XML data to extract the value from. If you don't specify, XML content you need to specify a file (if you specify both XML content will be used)

inputs.name: xmlFile
inputs.label: XML file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file with the XML to extract the value from. If you don't specify a file, you have to specify XML content
